meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels clearly show 02271.4. The red needle is between 0.04 and 0.05 on the dial, positioned approximately 70-75% of the way from 0.04 towards 0.05. Per rules, interpolating to 0.01 resolution means rounding to the closest hundredth, which is 0.05. Estimated needle angle is ~212 degrees from 12 o'clock.
